scripts.setup: npm install -g bower typings http-server typescript watchify
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run start
scripts.update: rm -rf bower_components typings node_modules; npm update; bower update; typings install
scripts.start: http-server -s -p 8000 & tsc -w -p src & watchify lib/index.js -o dist/duxca.lib.js -v
